text: TOTAL DIVAS – EPISODE 9 NOVEMBER 14, 2018 AIRED ON E! BY SARAH K., PWTORCH CONTRIBUTOR Are you ready for 44 minutes of grown women having first world problems and sometimes arguing for no reason? Oh, yeah, it ’ s another episode of Total Divas. Tonight is hopefully the conclusion of last week ’ s “ girls ’ vacation ” in Tahoe. I ’ m eating pizza rolls ( combination flavor ) and drinking Cherry Coke as I type this because I just got home from work … in case someone thought I would be eating something organic and drinking tea. Based on the show open, the women will be wearing bikinis at multiple points, Paige will be sunburned, and I will inevitably yell
